dcterms:creator: Wen Liu
Zhixin Piao

Wenhan Luo

Shenghua Gao
dcterms:description: The iPER dataset was collected in a laboratory environment and includes 30 actors with a total of 206 videos. The action types of an actor include A-pose and random actions. The scale of iPER is relatively large and the actions are relatively simple.
dcterms:title: iPER Dataset

dcterms:creator: Dongxu Wei
Xiaowei Xu
Haibin Shen
Kejie Huang
dcterms:description: The SoloDance dataset contains 179 solo dance videos in real scenes collected online, with each video having 300 frames. It features 143 subjects, and the action types are mainly dances such as hip-hop and modern dance.
dcterms:title: SoloDance Dataset
